item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am too fond of reading books to care to write them." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "Those people who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Orang-orang itu telah melupakan bahwa belajar tidaklah melulu untuk mengejar dan membuktikan sesuatu, namun belajar itu sendiri, adalah perayaan dan penghargaan pada diri sendiri. (hlm. 197)" -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Leo Buscaglia
item.description: "Life is a paradise for those who love many things with a passion." -- Leo Buscaglia

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Margaret Lee Runbeck
item.description: "Happiness is not a state to arrive at, but a manner of traveling." -- Margaret Lee Runbeck

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "If my doctor told me I had only six minutes to live, I wouldn't brood. I'd type a little faster." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Doris Mortman
item.description: "Until you make peace with who you are, you'll never be content with what you have." -- Doris Mortman

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Emerson, Ralph Waldo
item.description: "I cannot remember the books I've read any more than the meals I have eaten; even so, they have made me." -- Emerson, Ralph Waldo

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Annette Funicello
item.description: "Life does not have to be perfect to be wonderful." -- Annette Funicello

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Keep your face to the sun and you will never see the shadows." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Bertrand Russell
item.description: "There are two motives for reading a book; one, that you enjoy it; the other, that you can boast about it." -- Bertrand Russell

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Some lessons can't be taught, they simply have to be learned." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description:
"Tell me why the stars do shine, Tell me why the ivy twines, Tell me what makes skies so blue, And I'll tell you why I love you.
Nuclear fusion makes stars to shine, Tropisms make the ivy twine, Raleigh scattering make skies so blue, Testicular hormones are why I love you. " -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "A good library will never be too neat, or too dusty, because somebody will always be in it, taking books off the shelves and staying up late reading them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Maureen Corrigan
item.description: "It's not that I don't like people. It's just that when I'm in the company of others - even my nearest and dearest - there always comes a moment when I'd rather be reading a book." -- Maureen Corrigan

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Joseph Joubert
item.description: "The worst thing about new books is that they keep us from reading the old ones." -- Joseph Joubert

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Joseph Addison
item.description: "Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body." -- Joseph Addison

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Daniel Pennac
item.description:
"Reader's Bill of Rights
1. The right to not read
2. The right to skip pages
3. The right to not finish
4. The right to reread
5. The right to read anything
6. The right to escapism
7. The right to read anywhere
8. The right to browse
9. The right to read out loud
10. The right to not defend your tastes" -- Daniel Pennac

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Emilie Buchwald
item.description: "Children are made readers on the laps of their parents." -- Emilie Buchwald

item.title: Juliana Es add a quote by Anne Herbert
item.description: "Libraries will get you through times of no money better than money will get you through times of no libraries." -- Anne Herbert
